name: glidejs
description: Glide is a responsive and touch-friendly javascript slider. It's simple, lightweight and fast.
author: Jędrzej Chałubek <jedrzej.chalubek@gmail.com>

scripts.build:css:core: node-sass assets/sass/glide.core.scss dist/css/glide.core.css && node-sass assets/sass/glide.core.scss dist/css/glide.core.min.css --output-style=compressed
scripts.build:css:theme: node-sass assets/sass/glide.theme.scss dist/css/glide.theme.css && node-sass assets/sass/glide.theme.scss dist/css/glide.theme.min.css --output-style=compressed
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:core && npm run build:css:theme
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
